item.name: Cait Devin
item.description: Rock Valley welcomes Cait Devin for a night of live music accompanied by great food & drink. Enjoy a variety of acoustic originals and covers + electric guitar jams throughout the evening ðŸŽ¸ Plus artwork for sale! Rock Valley Brewing's Beer list includes but is not limited to IPA, Strawberry Rhubarb Wheat, Blonde, Pumpkin Ale, Apricot-Mango Wheat, Milk Stout, Rocklager, and much more. Live music runs from 7-10 pm. See you there!

item.name: Truck & ATV Sand Drags
item.description: Admission: Spectators - $10, Pits - $15 (Must be with a racer!), Children 12 and under - free. Must be a member to race! Day memberships available that day! June 8th TRUCKS: Gates Open at: 12PM, Registration: 12PM - 1:30PM, Driver's Meeting: 1:45PM, Racing Starts: 2PM. | June 9th ATVS: Gates Open at: 8AM, Registration: 8AM - 10AM, Driver's Meeting: 10:30AM, Racing Starts: 12PM.

item.name: Brookfield Garden Tractor Pullers Association Violet Festival Event
item.description: Food truck will be on site. Please support them.

item.name: The Posers
item.description: Join us at the Mohawk Wetlands Park and Pavilion on Tuesday, June 11th, from 6:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. Mrs. Shakes will be present with a variety of food offerings. This event marks the first in a summer series of shows organized by the Village of Mohawk's Recreation Committee. The Pavilion features a covered seating and dining area, ensuring a comfortable experience for all attendees. We invite you and your family to enjoy a delightful evening with us. The park is located off West Main Street; follow the gravel road towards the fishing access site, and you will find the Pavilion just past the Little League field on the left. We look forward to seeing you there.

item.name: The Posers
item.description: Come join us for a rockin' afternoon at the park, as The Posers take the stage! This group of longtime friends turned classic rock band knows how to bring the party. Expect a lively atmosphere filled with good vibes, great music, and plenty of fun. Whether you're a fan of classic rock or just looking to enjoy some live music with friends and family, The Posers always deliver.

item.name: Canal Celebration
item.description: For 36 years running, the Annual Canal Celebration has been a testament to our community's spirit, heritage, and the special essence that sets Little Falls apart in the Mohawk Valley. Drawing in thousands of visitors, this week-long event features a myriad of family-friendly programs. None of this would be possible without the hard work of over a hundred individuals from local organizations, businesses, industries, and the City of Little Falls employees, all coming together to make it happen.

item.name: Rock on the Mohawk
item.description: Come soak up the summer vibes along the picturesque Erie Canal! Jam out to tunes from talented local musicians, browse through unique creations from artisans and vendors, indulge in tasty treats, and most importantly, cherish moments with neighbors and friends. In loving memory of Gregg Caringi.

item.name: Garlic & Herb Festival
item.description: The Mohawk Valley boasts an ideal climate and soil for cultivating garlic and herbs, leading to a plethora of local producers. Our festival is a non-profit endeavor focused on promoting these crops, offering valuable insights to aspiring farmers and gardeners in the area. Additionally, we celebrate our community's rich arts scene by featuring musicians and local artisans. A portion of our proceeds goes to support the Mohawk Valley Center for the Arts, our esteemed neighbor and local non-profit.

item.name: Cheese Festival
item.description: Welcome to the ultimate gathering of cheesemakers in New York State! Join us in celebrating the vibrant dairy heritage of Central New York and honoring the local businesses that uphold these time-honored traditions. Explore a delightful array of over 120 cheeses, along with handcrafted artisan foods and refreshing craft beverages, all proudly made right here in our region!

item.name: Halloween in Little Falls
item.description: Halloween in Little Falls is a festive and family-friendly affair that attracts folks of all ages from near and far. It's a night filled with catching up with friends, enjoying family outings, admiring the spooky decorations, and fostering a strong sense of community spirit throughout the city.

item.name: Rock the Holidays
item.description: Experience the magic of Christmas in Little Falls, a festive holiday celebration brought to you by local businesses and non-profit organizations. Our array of enjoyable, mostly free events have delighted thousands of visitors from across the Mohawk Valley, inviting everyone to immerse themselves in the holiday cheer of our charming, scenic town nestled along the Erie Canal.
